name: Vans Standard MTE Hailey Langland Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
categories: Standard MTW Hailey Langland Waterproof Winte
description: Made in collaboration with professional snowboarder Hailey Langland, the waterproof and warm Standard MTE is sure to be a winter classic. This stylish boot from Vans keep your winter outfits sleek without sacrificing your foot comfort. In the unfortunate event that the insulated liner gets wet, it can be removed for easy drying.Leather upper with seam-sealed construction for water protection.Waterproof vulcanized rubber lower.Removable felt liner keeps feet warm.MTE rubber outsole with aggressive tread for traction in snow.Unisex sizes, women's US shoe is 1.5 sizes smaller than the equivalent unisex size. Please refer to the size chart to find your appropriate size.
